title: DDOS Attacked by aus
body:
DDoS attacking by aus <- username

Please make sure this guy has permanently blocked the account.

The game started at 15:30.

replies.body:
Pffffft. This is a videogame, designed for people to have fun, and then some just go ahead and do things like this. It's disheartening.

Please familiarise yourself with the [universal rules](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules) before posting again. You should not report players here; use a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for that.
